DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study was to evaluate the effect of Systane® compared to marketed artificial tears on the frequency of drop use.
DOC.brief_title: Product Preference With Systane Compared to Artificial Tears on Frequency of Drop Use
DOC.criteria: Subjects age 18 (minimum); reported history of dry eye syndrome in both eyes; TFBUT ≤ 7 seconds in at least 1 eye at Visit 1; ≥ 1+ fluorescein staining score in any region in at least 1 eye at Visit 1; desire to use an artificial tear substitute for dry eye symptoms at least 4 times per day at Visit 1 and Visit 2. Age less than 18 years
